Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to providing notice to elected officials upon receipt of application for a cannabis retail dispensary or on-site consumption license
Summary: Requires the cannabis control board to provide notice to state legislative representatives upon receipt of application for an adult-use cannabis retail dispensary or on-site consumption license in their district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to notice to elected officials upon receipt of certain applications
